name: Lower Down 48
description:
Submission for Ludum Dare 48

Lower Down 48

You'll need to go down 48 levels and hit a big red button. There'll be enemies in your way. Kill them for monies. There is a vendor level every 10 levels. Buy Laser Bolts and Bandages. If your health reaches 0, your Personal EMP will go off and kill all enemies for 2 levels...but at a 10 second penalty. Did i mention each level is a maze? Enemies also get harder the deeper you go. "Highest Score" board also.

Controls

Left Mouse to Fire/Melee (when out of ammo)

Right Mouse to Bandage

E to interact

Escape for Quit menu

(approx. 1 hour play time)
